data.message: I want to know why I have not been agreed to turn off my professional facebook

replies.message: Hello Taobao. If you do not think you will use Facebook again and would like your account deleted, we can take care of this for you. Keep in mind that you will not be able to reactivate your account or retrieve any of the content or information you have added. Learn how at: http://on.fb.me/VPGRCG -Sarah

my son made a page that we have tried deleting on more than one occasion but cannot. He typed in a password he cannot remember and every time we try to report the page it comes back with something to the extent of: our request didn't warrant enough reason for deletion. How can we delete his page for good?

Hello Desi. You can request to have your account permanently deleted. Please keep in mind that you won't be able to reactivate your account or retrieve anything you've added. Get step-by-step directions in our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1wOIotP -Sarah
